A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A sad film washed with political correctness... At the end of the day\, \"The Last Jedi\" truly is the last jedi. It is the end of an incredible cast of characters from the original trilogy who's personalities and character arches that were built over the last 30 years were completely butchered. A sad excuse for a movie. I'm sorry Mark\, I was upset.
